summary: This is a forwarded email chain from April 21, 2021, containing a strictly private and confidential letter addressed to Hon. Alison J. Nathan. The email suggests the recipients are unsure if they need to respond unless ordered, and it includes legal confidentiality disclaimers from a company regulated by the Solicitors Regulation Authority.

persons.name: Alison J. Nathan
persons.context: Addressed as 'Hon. Alison J. Nathan' in the attached correspondence, indicating she is a judge receiving confidential communication.

events.title: Confidential Letter to Judge Nathan
events.description: A strictly private and confidential letter is sent to Hon. Alison J. Nathan, with the email chain discussing whether a response is needed unless ordered.

keyFacts: A confidential letter was sent to Judge Alison J. Nathan on April 21, 2021, regarding an unspecified matter.
The email chain includes legal disclaimers indicating the communication is confidential and potentially privileged.
The correspondence originates from a company regulated by the Solicitors Regulation Authority, suggesting legal involvement.
